aWLI_StateProvision.content: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1036{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MS Sans Serif;}{\f1\fnil MS Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\f0\fs16 The company will pay for loss of Covered Property, resulting directly from the covered causes of loss, as defined in this endorsement.\par \par \par A; Inside the premises\par Covered Property: Money and securities inside the premises or a banking premises\par Covered causes of loss:\par Theft\par Disappearance\par Destruction\par B. Outside of the premises\par Covered Property: money and securities outside the rpemises in the care and custody of a messanger\par Covered causes of loss:\par Theft\par Disappearance\par Destruction\par \f1\par \b\f0 Limit of Insurance\par \b0 The most the company will pay for loss in any one occurrence is the applicable limit of insurance shown in the declarations.\f1\par }
aWLI_StateProvision.Title: Apartment Building-Theft, Disappearance, and Destruction Form
